name: simple_direct_conversion
code:
define 1 flurb = 3.5 grobble
convert 4 flurb to grobble

name: reverse_lookup
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.0 grobble
convert 10 grobble to flurb

name: two_hop_chain
code:
define 1 flurb = 3.0 grobble
define 1 grobble = 2.0 zept
convert 5 flurb to zept

name: three_hop_chain
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.5 grobble
define 1 grobble = 4.0 zept
define 1 zept = 0.5 quib
convert 8 flurb to quib

name: addition_same_unit
code:
define 1 flurb = 1.0 grobble
compute 10 flurb + 5 flurb in flurb

name: addition_mixed_units
code:
define 1 flurb = 3.0 grobble
compute 2 flurb + 6 grobble in grobble

name: subtraction_mixed
code:
define 1 flurb = 5.0 zept
compute 10 flurb - 20 zept in zept

name: multiplication_units
code:
define 1 voom = 2.0 quib
compute 4 voom * 3 voom in voom

name: division_units
code:
define 1 flurb = 4.0 grobble
compute 20 flurb / 5 flurb in flurb

name: complex_expression
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.0 grobble
define 1 grobble = 3.0 zept
compute 10 flurb + 5 grobble - 10 zept in zept

name: fractional_conversion
code:
define 1 voom = 1.5 quib
convert 6 voom to quib

name: reverse_chain
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.0 grobble
define 1 grobble = 5.0 zept
convert 50 zept to flurb

name: diamond_graph
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.0 grobble
define 1 flurb = 4.0 zept
define 1 grobble = 2.0 zept
convert 3 flurb to zept

name: mixed_addition_three_units
code:
define 1 flurb = 3.0 grobble
define 1 grobble = 2.0 zept
compute 2 flurb + 3 grobble + 12 zept in zept

name: zero_conversion
code:
define 1 flurb = 7.0 quib
convert 0 flurb to quib

name: large_scale_conversion
goal: Test numeric precision with large values
code:
define 1 flurb = 1.5 grobble
convert 10000 flurb to grobble

name: tiny_fraction_conversion
code:
define 1 voom = 0.001 quib
convert 5 voom to quib

name: four_hop_chain
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.0 grobble
define 1 grobble = 3.0 zept
define 1 zept = 1.5 quib
define 1 quib = 2.0 voom
convert 4 flurb to voom

name: bidirectional_verification
description: Convert forward and backward to verify consistency
code:
define 1 flurb = 3.0 grobble
convert 12 grobble to flurb

name: multiplication_chain
code:
define 1 flurb = 4.0 zept
compute 5 flurb * 3 flurb in zept

name: division_with_remainder
code:
define 1 voom = 3.0 quib
compute 10 voom / 3 voom in voom

name: nested_operations
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.0 grobble
define 1 grobble = 5.0 zept
compute (10 flurb + 20 grobble) * 2 grobble in zept

name: identity_conversion
code:
define 1 flurb = 1.0 grobble
convert 42 flurb to flurb

name: circular_graph
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.0 grobble
define 1 grobble = 3.0 zept
define 1 zept = 0.16666666666666666 flurb
convert 6 flurb to zept

name: mixed_arithmetic_four_units
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.0 grobble
define 1 grobble = 3.0 zept
define 1 zept = 4.0 quib
compute 1 flurb + 2 grobble + 3 zept + 4 quib in quib

name: subtraction_negative_result
code:
define 1 flurb = 5.0 zept
compute 10 zept - 4 flurb in zept

name: unit_power_conversion
code:
define 1 meter_square = 10.76 foot_squared
convert 5 meter_square to foot_squared

name: temperature_offset_conversion
code:
define 1 celsius = 1.8 fahrenheit
convert 100 celsius to fahrenheit

name: percentage_calculation
code:
define 1 percent = 0.01 decimal
convert 75 percent to decimal

name: scientific_notation
code:
define 1 kilometer = 1000.0 meter
convert 1e6 meter to kilometer
